content: this easy crochet pattern is perfect for carrying any size water bottle with a wide shoulder strap materials needed worsted weight yarn size i crochet hook yarn needle to weave in ends stitches used special stitch 2dc chain 2dc all in one stitch shell magic_ring magic_ring half_double_crochet half_double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain double_crochet in the back loops only blo double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet pattern notes all rounds are not done continuously at the end of each round you will do a slip_stitch into the first stitch of the round anything withing parentheses should be repeated the number of times indicated for instance 2hdc 10x means two half double crochets in each stitch for the next ten stitches on the right is your stitch count pattern 1 magic_ring with half_double_crochet 10x slip_stitch 10 2 chain 2hdc 10x slip_stitch 20 3 chain 2hdc half_double_crochet 10x slip_stitch 30 4 chain 2hdc half_double_crochet 2x 10x slip_stitch 40 5 chain 2x blo double_crochet 40x slip_stitch 40 6 chain 2x shell skip 4 sts 8x slip_stitch 40 7 - 17 slip_stitch 2x to the chain in the middle of the shell chain 2x shell skip to next chain 8x slip_stitch 40 18 chain single_crochet 40x slip_stitch 40 19 - 58 chain 2x double_crochet 5x turn your work 5 to connect the strap to round 18 skip 15 sts and slip_stitch 5x across both your current round and round 18 fasten_off and weave in ends
